name: arcanna-ai
label: Arcanna.ai
description: Arcanna.ai is a platform for delivering decision intelligence. It augments Security Operation Center analysts in dealing with incoming threats by increasing analyst efficiency in decision-making. More information is available at https://arcanna.ai

fields.title: Protocol
fields.name: protocol
fields.description: Specify the protocol of the Arcanna.ai server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Server Address
fields.name: server_address
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Arcanna.ai server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Server Port
fields.name: port
fields.description: Specify the port of the Arcanna.ai server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Api Key
fields.name: apiKey
fields.description: Specify the api key to access the Arcanna.ai server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Arcanna Response
operations.description: Retrieves a event status from Arcanna.ai server based on the job ID and event ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the job based on which you want to retrieve event status from Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.title: Event ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the event based on which you want to retrieve event status from Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: eventId

parameters.title: Retry Count
parameters.description: Specify the retry count of the event based on which you want to retrieve event status from Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: retryCount

parameters.title: Wait Time
parameters.description: Specify the wait time of the event based on which you want to retrieve event status from Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: waitTime

operations.title: Trigger AI Job Training
operations.description: Trigger AI job training in Arcanna.ai server based on the job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the job based on which you want to trigger AI job training in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: jobId

operations.title: Get Decision Set
operations.description: Retrieve the information of decision set from Arcanna.ai server based on the job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the job based on which you want to retrieve decision set from Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: jobId

operations.title: Export Event
operations.description: Exports an event from Arcanna.ai server based on the job ID and event ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the job based on which you want to export event from Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.title: Event ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the event based on which you want to export event from Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: eventId

operations.title: Send Feedback
operations.description: Send an feedback for a event in Arcanna.ai server.

parameters.title: User
parameters.description: Specify the user based on which you want to send feedback of an event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: user

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the job based on which you want to send feedback of an event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.title: Event ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the event based on which you want to send feedback of an event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: eventId

parameters.title: Closing Status
parameters.description: Specify the closing status based on which you want to send feedback of an event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: closingStatus
parameters.tooltip: Specify the closing status based on which you want to send feedback of an event in Arcanna.ai server.

operations.title: Get Jobs
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the jobs from Arcanna.ai server.

operations.title: Send To Arcanna
operations.description: Send an event in Arcanna.ai server based on the job ID, title, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Job ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the job based on which you want to send event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.title: Title
parameters.description: Specify the title based on which you want to send event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: title

parameters.title: Body
parameters.description: Specify the body based on which you want to send event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: body

parameters.title: Case ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the case based on which you want to send event in Arcanna.ai server.
parameters.name: caseId
